SELECT MORG.* FROM ( SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY WDT DESC) RN, TB.* FROM ( SELECT DATA.DATA_ID, DATA.GROUP_ID, DATA.AWARDS, DATA.AUTHOR, DATA.SUBJECT, DATA.YOUTUBE, DATA.CONTENT, DATA.WRITER, dbo.SF_USER_NM(DATA.WRITER) WRITER_NM, CONVERT(VARCHAR(19), DATA.WDT, 20) WDT, DATA.MODIFIER, CONVERT(VARCHAR(19),DATA.MDT, 20) MDT,
ATACH.ATCKEY_1ST, ATACH.ATCKEY_2ND, ATACH.ATCKEY_3RD, ATACH.ATCKEY_4TH, ATACH.VCHKCODE, ATACH.FPATH, ATACH.FNAME, ATACH.RNAME, ATACH.FEXT, ATACH.SIZE_KB
FROM CMS_AWARDS_DATA AS DATA LEFT JOIN CMS_ATACH AS ATACH ON DATA.DATA_ID = ATACH.ATCKEY_2ND AND ATACH.ATCKEY_1ST = 'AWARDS_THUMBNAIL' WHERE DATA.GROUP_ID=#{group_id} AND DATA.IS_NOTICE='N'
AND DATA.${searchCondition} LIKE '%' + #{searchKeyword} + '%'
) TB ) MORG WHERE rn BETWEEN #{firstIndex} + 1 AND #{firstIndex} + #{recordCountPerPage} ORDER BY MORG.AWARDS ASC, MORG.SUBJECT DESC
